urls.title: Red Flags: Chinese Laboratory in Wuhan Cited Two Years Ago For Dangerous Research On Bats and Coronavirus
urls.description: When the coronavirus first appeared in Wuhan, China, many people immediately raised the concern that it might have been the result of a lab release from a controversial Chinese Lab: the Wuhan Insti…

text: Many worked too hard to dismiss the Wuhan lab as a potential source. The theory was mocked in the media and Politifact dismissed it. There is a story here. Not just on the lab as a possible source but whether the media blinded itself to that possibility. https://t.co/glcRERBSmJ
